ORIGAM Documentation : Index Field

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Eva Čechurová on Jul 20, 2017

Indexes contain index keys, which define the fields the index is built on.You create an index key by adding an Index Field element under the index.

INDEX FIELD ATTRIBUTES

FieldThe field you need to index. Typically this is the field by which you filter the database.
OrdinalPositionThe Position of this field in a multi-column index.
SortOrderEither Ascending or Descending, depending how you prefer to sort the index.
